ch.bfh.bti7081.s2015.red.PatientApp.LifeUp

Class TimeActivityManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • ch.bfh.bti7081.s2015.red.PatientApp.LifeUp.TimeActivityManager
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class TimeActivityManager
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    This class handles all time relevant states, so they are going to be FinishedInTime or FinishedTooLate or Failed, depending if the patient has done the Activities in their soft/hard time limit or not.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addActivity(Activity activity)
      Add's an Activity to the TimeActivityManager
      void chooseActivity(Activity activity)
      Sets the TimeActivityManager to the current Activity.
      Activity getActivity()
      Returns the current Activity
      static TimeActivityManager getInstance()
      Returns the instance of the TimeActivityManager.
      void nextState()
      Does force the current Activity to change it's state to the next state.
      void run()
      Starts the Thread and check's in a 5 seconds interval if an Activity goes to the specific state depending on soft/hard time limit.
      void setActivityState(ActivityState activityState)
      Sets the referencing ActivityState to it's activity
